Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.name: identifier
Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.abstract: The unique identifier of the directory object

Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.name: parentIdentifier
Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.abstract: The identifier of the parent Directory if one exists

Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.name: order
Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.abstract: The position at which this directory should be displayed when presented in a list

Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.name: metadata
Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.abstract: The assosciated metadata. This contains additional information about the directory object.

Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.name: content
Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.abstract: The raw markdown content of the directory

Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.name: directories
Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.abstract: An array of directory objects which are objects to display beneath this directory when it is viewed expanded

Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.name: attachments
Structs/Directory.html#/s:6DMSSDK9Direct.abstract: An array of file descriptors that are assosciated with this directory

Structs/FileDescriptor.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: title
Structs/FileDescriptor.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: The name of the file which can be displayed to a user

Structs/FileDescriptor.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: url
Structs/FileDescriptor.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: The remote URL which can be used to access the file.

Structs/FileDescriptor.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: size
Structs/FileDescriptor.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: The size of the remote file in bytes

Structs/FileDescriptor.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: description
Structs/FileDescriptor.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: A description of the file to give a user more context before downloading

Structs/BundleInformation.html#/s:6DMSSD.name: identifier
Structs/BundleInformation.html#/s:6DMSSD.abstract: The bundle identifier as provided by the server

Structs/BundleInformation.html#/s:6DMSSD.name: publishDate
Structs/BundleInformation.html#/s:6DMSSD.abstract: The timedate that the bundle was created

Structs/BundleInformation.html#/s:6DMSSD.name: downloadURL
Structs/BundleInformation.html#/s:6DMSSD.abstract: The URL to download the file (May be a redirect)

Structs/BundleInformation.html#/s:6DMSSD.name: availableLanguages
Structs/BundleInformation.html#/s:6DMSSD.abstract: The language codes of the available languages

Structs/BundleInformation.html.name: BundleInformation
Structs/BundleInformation.html.abstract: Contains information about an available storm bundle on the server

Structs/FileDescriptor.html.name: FileDescriptor
Structs/FileDescriptor.html.abstract: An object representing a file available at a URL

Enums/BundleError.html#/s:6DMSSDK11Bundl.name: InvalidDataReturned
Enums/BundleError.html#/s:6DMSSDK11Bundl.abstract: The server returned an invalid response that could not be parsed into useful data

Enums/BundleError.html.name: BundleError
Enums/BundleError.html.abstract: An enum representing possible errors that may occur when attempting to download bundle data

Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: currentBundleTimestamp
Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: The timestamp of the bundle that is currently in use by the app. Returns 0 if there is not any

Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: init()
Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: Initialises the content controller and creates the directories for the bundle if they are missing

Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: getBundleInformation(for:language:completion:)
Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: Retrieves information about the latest bundle/publish for a project. This can be used to compare the current bundle and determine if there is an update available

Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: downloadBundle(from:progress:completion:)
Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: Downloads a bundle for the given project and unpacks it for use.

Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: downloadDocumentFile(from:progress:completion:)
Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: Downloads the file from a given url and stores it in the Documents directory for the app

Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: fileUrl(forResource:withExtension:inDirectory:)
Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: Returns the file url of a file in the bundle

Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: fileUrl(from:)
Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: Provides a file URL for a file from a content path

Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.name: localFileURL(for:)
Classes/ContentManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK14.abstract: Checks the local disk to see if we have already downloaded a file for a remote URL.

Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.name: directories
Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.abstract: An array of top level directories loaded using one of the DirectoryManager initialisers

Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.name: init(directories:)
Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.abstract: Initialises the manager with an optional array of directories. If you wish to initialise using the structure.json from the parent app’s bundle, please call the init() method

Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.name: init()
Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.abstract: Initialises the DirectoryManager using structure.json from the parent app’s bundle if available.

Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.name: init(dataSource:)
Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.abstract: Initialises the DirectoryManager with a JSON Object that can be parsed into an array of Directory objects

Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.name: directory(for:in:)
Classes/DirectoryManager.html#/s:6DMSSDK.abstract: Searches for a directory with a given identifier. This method will start with the given array and recurse through each items directory array until all paths are exhausted.

Classes/DirectoryManager.html.name: DirectoryManager
Classes/DirectoryManager.html.abstract: A manager that loads the directory data and provides utilities for loading data surrounding directories

Classes/ContentManager.html.name: ContentManager
Classes/ContentManager.html.abstract: A controller responsible for managing content and bundles. This includes facilitating the downloads and updates of new bundle content.
